roleset.name: save and exchange
roleset.note: REDEEM-V NOTES: There's a joke here about Jesus redeeming sinners, but let's not gothere. :) (from redeem.01-v)
REDEMPTION-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to redeem.01. VN class steal-10.5. No FN class. Framed by Katie. (from redemption.01-n)

example.name: boring transitive
example.text: The restaurant operator said it has redeemed its rights issued Monday under its shareholder rights plan.
example.arg: its rights issued Monday under its shareholder rights plan

example.name: clearly in exchange
example.text: The company said it can redeem the warrants at its option for $1 each.

example.name: less obviously in exchange
example.text: Hudson's Bay said it will redeem 9.5 million Series H preferred shares on Oct. 31 at a price of C$ 27.75 each.
example.arg: at a price of C$ 27.75 each

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: Shareholders' redemption of preferred stock purchase rights .

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: the redemption Dec. 6 of the company 's $ 1 cumulative convertible special preferred stock at $ 37.5 a share, not including a 25 cent dividend for the current quarter
example.arg: of the company 's $ 1 cumulative convertible special preferred stock
at $ 37.5 a share, not including a 25 cent dividend for the current quarter
